```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE)
library(vitae)
library(tinytex)
library(tidyverse)
library(xlsx)

cv_info<-read.xlsx("cv_input_data/cv_info.xlsx",sheetIndex = 1)
cv_info<-cv_info %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor,as.character) %>%
  arrange(end_year) %>%
  mutate(when=end_year)
```

# Academic Information

```{r ACADEMIC_INFO}
cv_info %>%
  filter(section=="academic") %>%
  detailed_entries(
    what = what,
    when = when,
    with = with,
    where = where
  )
```

# Publications

```{r PUBLICATIONS}
pbs_df<-readRDS("cv_input_data/pubs_data.rds")
pbs_df %>%
  mutate(author_string=gsub("\\*","",author_string)) %>%
  mutate(journal_string=gsub("\\*","",journal_string)) %>%
  detailed_entries(
    what = title_string,
    when = year,
    with = author_string,
    where = journal_string
  )
```
